result.title: Doubt regarding this problem : http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/194/A
result.content:
Hi Everyone,

I'm a newbie here.I just started solving Div 2 A problems. I solved the following problem using a brute force approach. http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/194/A

I was looking at the editorial here â€” http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/4673 I don't understand the logic behind "3n-k" being used.

Can anyone please help?
